# Pull Requesting.
> [!IMPORTANT]
> Your pull-request must be categorized as 1 type, in case of not being so, it will be automatically declined.

## Format
 ### Type
 <!-- A PR That patches a knew issue. -->
  - [ ] Bug Patch
  <!-- A PR That adds the implementation of a new thing, such as a library, a new format.-->
  - [ ] Implementation
   <!-- Adding support to a software: Ej: Added support to Java. -->
  - [ ] Add Support to _____
  <!-- PRs that implements new functionalities -->
  - [ ] Functionalities
  <!-- Documentation Updates PRs-->
  - [ ] Documentation
  <!-- Anything else. -->
  - [ ] Other: ________
 ### Description
 <!-- Here goes the description or reason of why adding this. -->
 N/A
